comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: SoulMortal on September 04, 2023, 11:51:05 AMI need one verified account pm me with the price.Buying any type of account is risky and there is a chance to be scammed in various ways. Firstly it can be scammed by not sending the proper credentials. 2ndly there is a chance to change the credentials or report as hacked. Thirdly, if you face a KYC issue, you may not get the seller. So, think twice before buying account.
